now I want you to add a drop down, with five options: 1, 2, 3, 4 ,5

You need to go to the "Components" tab on the MakeInfinite studio and drag and drop a dropdown component into the canvas. After that, you can specify the options for it. Let me know if you need help with anything else!
show me the components
The current components in your app are: `Footer1732090458`, `Hero1732090458`, and `Header1732090458`. If you need to make changes to any of them or add new components, just let me know!
